channel.title: Help my server kick me off
channel.description: help my server will lose connectoin and when i try and relog in it says server is down yet im on phone with friends and theirs still 30people on my server. help thanks.

item.title: Help my server kick me off
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Just restart it and maybe some booted you…

1)Maybe your computer is laggy… Delete some stuff you don’t need.
2)Maybe if you use hamachi maybe reboot hamachi , because it keeps losing connection…
3)If you have no-ip I find that laggs… maybe switch to hamachi… http://www.hamachi.cc
4)Maybe someone is clicking too fast on something , or attacking a npc they aren’t suppose to. (crashing the server)
5)Maybe someone booted you somehow but not the others…

Try to figure out which. winksmile

Read full topic
item.source: Help my server kick me off
